Description:
The CarePlan (Dental CarePlan) resource returns a patient's dental treatments or options. Dental treatments represent a plan of care for one or more of a patient's issues and consist of one or more visits, which each contain one or more procedures. Dental options are options for how a treatment plan can be carried out, and each option can have its own visits and procedures, though only a single option is selected for a planned treatment. This resource can return a specific treatment or option by ID or a list of the patient's treatments (which point to their options) if you search by patient.

The search interaction enables the lookup of one or more CarePlan resources, filtered by the specified parameters.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Type of plan. 738906000 should be used to search for dental treatment plans.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Patient FHIR resource ID for the patient associated with the care plan. If provided, all treatments associated with the patient are returned.

status.Name: status
status.Description: Treatment plan status. If provided, only treatments in the specified subset of statuses are returned.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

CarePlan.Name: CarePlan
CarePlan.Description: An instance of the R4 CarePlan resource.

activity.Name: activity
activity.Description: For an option, reference to child visits.

addresses.Name: addresses
addresses.Description: Reference link to the dental finding addressed in this treatment.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Type of plan. 738906000 should be used to search for dental treatment plans.

contributor.Name: contributor
contributor.Description: The user who approved the treatment.

created.Name: created
created.Description: The instant the treatment or option was created.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: Either "plan" or "proposal," depending on whether the treatment or option is active or has been completed.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The time that the treatment was completed.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the treatment or option. Can be "active," "completed," "draft," or "revoked."

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient or subject of this treatment plan.

supportingInfo.Name: supportingInfo
supportingInfo.Description: For a treatment, reference to child treatment plan options.

title.Name: title
title.Description: The title of the treatment plan or name of the option.
